meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family with showy flowers
meanings.sent1: The columbine in the garden has beautiful red flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a columbine in my backyard for its colorful blooms.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzz happily around the columbine, enjoying its nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and delicate as a columbine in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The columbine swayed gracefully in the gentle breeze, a true floral beauty.

meanings.definition: A high school massacre in Colorado in 1999
meanings.sent1: The tragic columbine shocked the nation and led to changes in school security.
meanings.sent2: Students across the country remember the columbine with sorrow.
meanings.sent3: The school play was a disaster, but not a columbine kind of disaster!
meanings.sent4: The impact of the columbine forever changed how schools approach safety.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the columbine serves as a somber reminder of the importance of mental health support.

meanings.definition: A type of pigeon with a ring of bare skin around the eyes
meanings.sent1: The columbine pigeon perched on the rooftop, its distinctive eye ring visible.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a columbine bird in the park with its unique eye markings.
meanings.sent3: The columbine pigeon seemed to be wearing stylish eye makeup.
meanings.sent4: The columbine's eye ring gave it a mysterious and elegant appearance.
meanings.sent5: The columbine pigeon's eye ring made it stand out among the other birds in the flock.
